headline: KKR Names New Global Atlantic Leaders, Succeeding Allan Levine

headline: UK's Assura gets $2.08 billion offer from KKR consortium
summary: British healthcare real estate investment trust Assura plc on Monday said it received an indicative, non-binding 1.61-billion-pound proposal from KKR and Stonepeak Partners . ...

headline: KKR (NYSE:KKR) Drops 15% Despite Ajax Health Partnership Targeting Heart Failure
summary: Ajax Health's announcement of the creation of FlowMod in collaboration with KKR (NYSE:KKR) marked a significant strategic alliance aimed at addressing heart failure. Despite such forward-looking collaborations, KKR's stock experienced a 15% decline in the past week. This downturn contrasts with broader market conditions, where major indexes like the S&P 500 and Nasdaq faced their third consecutive weekly decline, faltering by 3.4% overall. KKR’s recent interest in acquiring stakes in...
